column1: Provana Is Looking For Transition Manager on Priority
column2: Hi Job Seeker, Provana is looking for the Transition Manager with valid US Visa urgently.   Role & responsibilities Lead end-to-end transition projects, from planning and initiation to execution and closure. Collaborate with internal stakeholders, clients, and third-party vendors to define transition requirements and timelines. Develop detailed transition plans, including resource allocation, milestones, and deliverables. Monitor project progress and manage risks and issues proactively to ensure timely and successful delivery. Coordinate with cross-functional teams, including operations, IT, and quality assurance, to ensure alignment and adherence to transition plans. Conduct regular status meetings and provide progress reports to stakeholders, highlighting key achievements and areas for improvement. Identify opportunities for process optimization and efficiency improvements during the transition phase. Ensure compliance with relevant regulations, standards, and best practices throughout the transition process. Preferred candidate profile   Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Project Management, or related field; Master's degree preferred. [Specify number] years of experience in transition management or project management roles, preferably in a similar industry or domain. Proven track record of successfully leading transition projects from initiation to closure. Strong project management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks, manage timelines, and mitigate risks effectively. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate with diverse stakeholders and build consensus. Sound analytical and problem-solving abilities, with a focus on driving continuous improvement. Certification in project management (e.g., PMP, PRINCE2) is a plus.   Please note that Provana is operational 5 days a week and work from office.
column11: Transition, Knowledge Sharing, Transition Planning, Process Transition, Business Transition, Transition Management, Mobilisation, Due Diligence

column2: We are looking for a product manager who can lead the development and launch of our mobile app for Point of Sales Persons (PoSP) in the insurance sector. As a product manager, you will be responsible for: 1) Conducting market research and user feedback to identify the needs and pain points of PoSPs and their customers 2) Defining the product vision, strategy, roadmap, and features for the mobile app. 3) Collaborating with the engineering, design, marketing, and sales teams to deliver a high-quality and user-friendly app. The work demands project management skills, up-to-date knowledge of mobile and web capabilities, and a professional approach to time, costs, and deadlines. 4) Measuring and analyzing the app performance, user behaviour, and feedback, and making data-driven decisions to improve the app 5) Staying updated with the latest trends, regulations, and best practices in the insurance industry and the PoSP domain 6) Establish product specifications and write PRDs.  To be successful in this role, you should have: 1) A preferred candidate should have both technical knowledge of mobile app??, databases, and system integrations along with business knowledge of the insurance sector 2) A graduate degree in computer science, and engineering with a master?? in business 3) At least 3 years of experience in product management, preferably in the insurance or fintech sector 4) Experience in developing and launching mobile apps, preferably for PoSPs or similar segments 5) Knowledge of the insurance industry and the PoSP regulations in India 6) Excellent communication, presentation, analytical, and problem-solving skills 7) A customer-centric and data-driven mindset
column11: Product Management, Product Development, PoSP regulations, system integrations, Relationship Building
